data.name: Sketchbots: Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: Immerse yourself into the world of retro arcade nostalgia with the Sketchbots: Original Soundtrack, featuring an interesting blend of familiar synth sounds from the '80s and modern electronic sound design elements. The soundtrack, composed by Luka Ilic, consists of 10 tracks that range from atmospheric Vangelis-style soundscapes to very upbeat, groovy rhythms. The music revolves around engaging themes with an accent on catchy tunes which you will surely find yourself whistling while guiding the little robots to victory!
data.about_the_game: Immerse yourself into the world of retro arcade nostalgia with the Sketchbots: Original Soundtrack, featuring an interesting blend of familiar synth sounds from the '80s and modern electronic sound design elements. The soundtrack, composed by Luka Ilic, consists of 10 tracks that range from atmospheric Vangelis-style soundscapes to very upbeat, groovy rhythms. The music revolves around engaging themes with an accent on catchy tunes which you will surely find yourself whistling while guiding the little robots to victory!
data.short_description: Immerse yourself into the world of retro arcade nostalgia with the Sketchbots: Original Soundtrack, featuring an interesting blend of familiar synth sounds from the '80s and modern electronic sound design.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 72 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 294 MB available space
